RCR.Settings.Flanking.Menu.Name: Flanking
RCR.Settings.Flanking.Menu.Label: Configure Flanking
RCR.Settings.Flanking.Menu.Hint: Set flanking behaviour, bonus type, and ally requirements.
RCR.Settings.EnableFlanking.Name: Enable Flanking
RCR.Settings.EnableFlanking.Hint: Melee attackers adjacent with an ally on the opposite side gain a bonus.
RCR.Settings.FlankingBehaviour.Name: Behaviour
RCR.Settings.FlankingBehaviour.Hint: Choose advantage or a flat modifier when flanking applies.
RCR.Settings.FlankingRequiresActive.Name: Active Ally Required
RCR.Settings.FlankingRequiresActive.Hint: The flanking ally must not be dead, prone, incapacitated, unconscious, petrified, stunned, or paralyzed.
RCR.Settings.Surrounded.Menu.Name: Surrounded
RCR.Settings.Surrounded.Menu.Label: Configure Surrounded
RCR.Settings.Surrounded.Menu.Hint: Set the bonus when all 4 cardinal sides of a target are blocked.
RCR.Settings.EnableSurrounded.Name: Enable Surrounded
RCR.Settings.EnableSurrounded.Hint: Melee attackers gain a bonus when all 4 cardinal sides of the target are blocked by enemies or walls.
RCR.Settings.SurroundedBehaviour.Name: Behaviour
RCR.Settings.SurroundedBehaviour.Hint: Choose advantage or a flat modifier when surrounded applies.
RCR.Settings.Elevation.Menu.Name: Elevation
RCR.Settings.Elevation.Menu.Label: Configure Elevation
RCR.Settings.Elevation.Menu.Hint: Set high ground advantage/bonus and low ground disadvantage/penalty for ranged attacks.
RCR.Settings.EnableHighGround.Name: Enable High Ground
RCR.Settings.EnableHighGround.Hint: Ranged attacks gain a bonus when the attacker is at least 10 ft higher than the target.
RCR.Settings.HighGroundBehaviour.Name: High Ground Bonus
RCR.Settings.HighGroundBehaviour.Hint: Choose advantage or a flat modifier for high ground.
RCR.Settings.EnableLowGround.Name: Enable Low Ground
RCR.Settings.EnableLowGround.Hint: Ranged attacks suffer a penalty when the attacker is at least 10 ft lower than the target.
RCR.Settings.LowGroundBehaviour.Name: Low Ground Penalty
RCR.Settings.LowGroundBehaviour.Hint: Choose disadvantage or a flat penalty for low ground.
RCR.Settings.Conditions.Menu.Name: Conditions
RCR.Settings.Conditions.Menu.Label: Configure Conditions
RCR.Settings.Conditions.Menu.Hint: Toggle automatic advantage/disadvantage from combat conditions.
RCR.Settings.EnableConditionAdvantage.Hi: Automatically apply advantage or disadvantage from conditions (blinded, restrained, prone, invisible, poisoned, paralyzed, stunned, unconscious).
RCR.Settings.Ammo.Menu.Name: Ammunition
RCR.Settings.Ammo.Menu.Label: Configure Ammunition
RCR.Settings.Ammo.Menu.Hint: Track ammo consumed during combat and offer recovery when combat ends.
RCR.Settings.EnableAmmoTracking.Name: Enable Tracking
RCR.Settings.EnableAmmoTracking.Hint: Track ammunition consumed during combat and show a recovery popup to each player when combat ends.
RCR.Settings.RecoverMagicalAmmo.Name: Magical Recovery
RCR.Settings.RecoverMagicalAmmo.Hint: If enabled, magical ammunition can be recovered like normal ammo. If disabled, magical ammunition is always lost when consumed.
RCR.Note.Flanking.Label: Flanking
RCR.Note.Flanking.DescAdv: An ally is on the opposite side - attack has advantage.
RCR.Note.Flanking.DescMod: An ally is on the opposite side - +{value} bonus to the attack roll.
RCR.Note.Surrounded.Label: Surrounded
RCR.Note.Surrounded.DescAdv: All cardinal sides are blocked - attack has advantage.
RCR.Note.Surrounded.DescMod: All cardinal sides are blocked - +{value} bonus to the attack roll.
RCR.Note.HighGround.Label: High Ground
RCR.Note.HighGround.DescAdv: Attacker is 10+ ft above the target - attack has advantage.
RCR.Note.HighGround.DescMod: Attacker is 10+ ft above the target - +{value} bonus to the attack roll.
RCR.Note.LowGround.Label: Low Ground
RCR.Note.LowGround.DescDisadv: Attacker is 10+ ft below the target - attack has disadvantage.
RCR.Note.LowGround.DescMod: Attacker is 10+ ft below the target - {value} penalty to the attack roll.
RCR.Reason.TargetProneMelee: Target is prone - melee has advantage.
RCR.Reason.TargetProneRanged: Target is prone - ranged has disadvantage.
